tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ******** ***** ** ****** ** **** 

I did some R&D and found Jaswanth , on the very first day, the moment i talked to him in first 5 mins i decided to go with RCT as He is well versed in this area and seemed extremely calm while performing RCT.

Highly Experienced , I strongly recommend him for RCT.

High standards and world class treatment.

All the staff are very responsible.

As per my opinion, Please note pain is part and parcel of this treatment based on the case we have, so we cannot escape Karma(eg. why wisdom tooths,tooths problems only to some population) decide but Doctor like Jaswanth will do what ever possible to reduce our bad Karma :-)

hope the above feedback will help you little bit to consider doctor with out much hesitation.

Thank you SSR dental and special thanks to Dr Jaswanth reddy.

Thanks and Regards
Sreenivas

He is an awesome doctor who will patiently listen to your problem and accordingly give a proper medical solution.
I had gone for Root canal For 3 tooths . Doc Jaswant  explained the entire process and while taking each step he explained me in advance.
The best thing that I liked about this was that doctor followed up about my condition and well being! It personally adds a lot of care and warmth to your experience. Thanks a lot doctor! :)
If you have any dental issues I recommend you visit his clinic and consult him without any doubt.
reply_text: Thank you very much and you made us more responsible and passionate towards our work and profession Ms Reetika.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Broken Teeth,Loose Teeth,Widely Spaced Teeth,Crowded Teeth,Toothache,
review: dr jaswanth is very friendly and experience d doctorI strongly recommend him for any sort of treatmentI got a root canal done and my husband got an implant done for his missing tooth and my niece got her full mouth rehab here I can say all of our family visit for any dental issues and we are treated with high standars and world class treatmentthank you SSR dental and special thanks to dr jaswanth reddy

My experience was not Good.
I had fixed Ceramic teeth 2-3 Months back with 7 years warranty.
Now it is damaging And Doctor is just saying me that you have to come first after that only we can check.

They are not talking Properly, I can't come because we are not locals otherwise I can meet. **** ****** **** ******** ***** *** ******* * **** ****** ************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Receptionist did not tell me that doctor is not available until I pay the appointment. Second thing receptionist is saying she will take the scan before doctor comes so that we can save time. Later she started treated me analysing the scan and telling me to go for extraction of teeth. Doctor did not come only then I demanded for doctor opinion later she called doctor finally he came. Doctor did even check what is the issue and he is simply believing his receptionist and asking me to go for tooth extraction. He started scaring me and didn’t even recommended medicine. ***** * ******* ******* ****** *** ****** ******* ** **** ** ** **** * ******** **** *** ** ******* ** **** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Painful Teething,Soft Tissue Swelling of face and neck,
review:
Dr. Jaswanth was extremely helpful, patient and the diagnosis and medicine was extremely effective for my mother.
I highly recommend him.
reply_text: Thank you for your positive feed back

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited this clinic in 2013 as well as 2015 due to Dental problem. I found personally the docter is very good and clearly listen to dental problems. I never had any issue after getting treatment from him in the past hence I have decided to visit his clinic this time as well
